The RING+

This smart ring is crafted from lightweight, eco-friendly PLA, offering comfort and durability for everyday wear. It features built-in Bluetooth connectivity for seamless syncing with your smartphone or wearable devices. Integrated emotional tracking sensors monitor subtle biometric signals to provide real-time insights into your mood and stress levels.

Health Care

With the heartbeat sensor and emotional tracking, we can give you the best health.

Adjustable Text

Set the text/name you want to laser cut in your ring to make it different.

PLA plastic

Used sustainable plastic to make the earth a better place.
